summary: Live-action sci-fi movie based on a 1973 Japanese animé of the same name (Shinzo Ningen Casshân). Theme song by Utada Hikaru.
cast: Yûsuke Iseya|Kumiko Asô|Akira Terao|Kanako Higuchi|Fumiyo Kohinata|Hiroyuki Miyasako|Mayumi Sada|Jun Kaname|Hidetoshi Nishijima|Mitsuhiro Oikawa|Susumu Terajima|Mayu Tsuruta|Ryô|Tetsuji Tamayama|Yôko Moriguchi|Hideji Ôtaki|Tatsuya Mihashi|Toshiaki Karasawa|Kôhei Kitajima|Ei Morisako|Gorô Naya|Satoshi Shiomi
keywords: live action remake of anime|mutant|human experimentation|dystopia|biotechnology
title: Casshern
